message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a lot
I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with unreasonable offers. Deal?
Come on, let's meet in the middle, I've lowered my expectations a bit
Time is running out, and the pot is shrinking.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a smaller cut, but I won't go below this
